pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========SageMath========----------------------------------------------A free open-source mathematics software system----------------------------------------------This is a dummy package that checks that Sage is installed in the system. Please see www.sagemath.org for instructions on how to download and install the actual software.SageMath is a free open-source mathematics software system licensed under the GPL. It builds on top of many existing open-source packages: NumPy, SciPy, matplotlib, Sympy, Maxima, GAP, FLINT, R and many more. Access their combined power through a common, Python-based language or directly via interfaces or wrappers.
